title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 302.1 - Submission of bills to social services districts for services and supplies furnished to recipients of public assistance and payment thereof
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 302.1 - Submission of bills to social services districts for services and supplies furnished to recipients of public assistance and payment thereof

State Regulations

Each social services district shall: (a) require that bills be submitted to it
promptly by vendors of services and supplies furnished to public assistance
recipients for which payment is to be made by the social services district to
the vendors; (b) arrange to pay the
bills promptly; and
(c) process
payments in accordance with the provisions of section
601.3
of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
302.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
